article_title: IKEA Probes Claims That It Funded Romanian Secret Police
article_text:
IKEA is investigating claims that it paid money that ended up with dictator Nicolae Ceausescu's secret police during the 1980s communist era.

Responding to a report in British daily the Guardian that the furniture giant knowingly overpaid for products made in Romania, IKEA spokeswoman Josefin Thorell said the company has opened an internal probe that will go through the recently declassified documents of Securitate in search of...
